rules_text:
When this enchantment enters, exile the top four cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
Discard a card or sacrifice a creature: Put target card exiled with this enchantment into its owner’s hand.
notes:

OG_1:
Exile the top four cards of your library face down. You may look at and play those cards until the end of your next turn.
For as long as you can play any of those cards, you may discard a card or sacrifice a creature to put one into your hand.


Alt_1:

Exile the top four cards of your library face down. You may look at and play those cards until the end of your next turn. Until the end of your next turn, those cards have “Discard a card or sacrifice a creature: Put this card into your hand.”

Alt_2:
(enchantment)
When Distill Fears enters the battlefield, exile the top four cards of your library face down, then sacrifice Distill Fears at the end of your next turn.
You may look at and play cards exiled with Distill Fears.
Discard a card or sacrifice a creature: Put a card exiled with Distill Fears into your hand.
